name: SpaceSheep (gALEXyMAN)
description:
Control commander shepherd dog and gather as many sheep stranded in space!  Use your mighty bark to guide sheep towards your ship and push obstacles out of the way. If your ship gets hit by any obstacles, you lose all the sheep onboard and if you have no sheep then it's game over! Every 10 sheep you gain, will be transferred to the space farm station so you won't lose them.

Controls

w/up arrow key - thrust forward

a/d/left/right arrow keys - rotate

spacebar - bark
